reviewText:
For some spirits who still believe in utopian fables which remain under the carpet of the history, this legendary Mexican film might become a slap in the face and the beginning of a crude disappointment.

An opportunist landowner, bets for the possibility to remain loyal to a general in Zapata's Army, with an unique double purpose: to save his own skin and to avoid from being financially ruined.

And don't forget the famous utterance: " Each revolution is like Saturn , devours his own sons, to preserve itself. "
